NotificationContents.SmsText: Refrigerator door alarm is sounding. Check that the door is closed and/or items aren’t blocking the door.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Refrigerator door alarm is sounding. Check that the door is closed and/or items aren’t blocking the door.
NotificationContents.PushText: Refrigerator door alarm is sounding. Check that the door is closed and/or items aren’t blocking the door.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Refrigerator started Max Cool temporarily reducing the refrigerator set temperature.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Refrigerator started Max Cool temporarily reducing the refrigerator set temperature.
NotificationContents.PushText: Refrigerator started Max Cool temporarily reducing the refrigerator set temperature.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Refrigerator exited Max Cool returning the refrigerator temperature to the prior set temperature.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Refrigerator exited Max Cool returning the refrigerator temperature to the prior set temperature.
NotificationContents.PushText: Refrigerator exited Max Cool returning the refrigerator temperature to the prior set temperature.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Refrigerator started Max Ice temporarily reducing the freezer set temperature.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Refrigerator started Max Ice temporarily reducing the freezer set temperature.
NotificationContents.PushText: Refrigerator started Max Ice temporarily reducing the freezer set temperature.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Refrigerator exited Max Ice returning the freezer temperature to the prior set temperature.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Refrigerator exited Max Ice returning the freezer temperature to the prior set temperature.
NotificationContents.PushText: Refrigerator exited Max Ice returning the freezer temperature to the prior set temperature.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Review the contents of your refrigerator - it is over temperature.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Review the contents of your refrigerator - it is over temperature.
NotificationContents.PushText: Review the contents of your refrigerator - it is over temperature.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Review the contents of your refrigerator - it is over temperature.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Review the contents of your refrigerator - it is over temperature.
NotificationContents.PushText: Review the contents of your refrigerator - it is over temperature.

NotificationContents.SmsText: It’s time to check the status of the refrigerator's air filter or produce preserver
NotificationContents.EmailText: It’s time to check the status of the refrigerator's air filter or produce preserver
NotificationContents.PushText: It’s time to check the status of the refrigerator's air filter or produce preserver

NotificationContents.SmsText: It's just about time to replace your refrigerator's water filter, order now.Once the water filter is replaced, flush the water system as described in the Use & Care Guide before using the dispenser. You should also discard the initial (3) batches of ice.
